articles.description: May is quickly approaching, which means the Met Gala is almost here. Curious where to watch the Met Gala? What time it starts? Who will be there? Here’s everything to know.
articles.content: May is quickly approaching, meaning that if youre even somewhat plugged into fashion or culture, you know the Met Gala is looming. Maybe youve spent the past first Monday of May barely paying attenti… [+2162 chars]
